          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Fakta om Sverige 1 - motsatsord</string>
            <string language="en">Facts about Sweden 1 - motsatsord</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tatsachen über Schweden 1 - motsatsord</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faits sur la Suède 1 - motsatsord</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fatos sobre Sweden 1 - motsatsord</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fatti circa la Svezia 1 - motsatsord</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεγονότα για τη Σουηδία 1 - motsatsord</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hechos sobre Suecia 1 - motsatsord</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Samtidigt som du genom att lyssna på och läsa en text om Sverige får du tillfälle att träna på motsatsord.Modul 4 - Hur bor du? - Sverige 3.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">While you are by listening to and read a text about Sweden, you get the opportunity to practice motsatsord. Module 4 - How do you live? - Sweden 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">Sverige</string>
            <string language="sv">fakta</string>
            <string language="sv">motsatser</string>
            <string language="sv">motsatsord</string>

            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">Sweden</string>
            <string language="en">facts</string>
            <string language="en">opposites</string>
            <string language="en">motsatsord</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Während Sie sind, indem Sie zu hören und einen 
Text über Schweden lesen, erhalten Sie die Gelegenheit, motsatsord zu
üben. Modul 4 - Wie leben Sie? - Schweden 3. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tandis que vous êtes par l'écoute et lisez un 
texte au sujet de la Suède, vous obtenez l'occasion de pratiquer le 
motsatsord. Module 4 - Comment vivez-vous ? - la 
Suède 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quando você for escutando e ler um texto sobre 
Sweden, você começa a oportunidade de praticar o motsatsord. 
Módulo 4 - Como você vive? - Sweden 3. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mentre siete ascoltando e leggete un testo circa 
la Svezia, ottenete l'occasione esercitarsi nel motsatsord. 
Modulo 4 - Come vivete? - la Svezia 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενώ είστε με το άκουσμα και διαβάζετε ένα κείμενο 
για τη Σουηδία, φτάνετε την ευκαιρία στην πρακτική motsatsord. 
Ενότητα 4 - πώς ζείτε; - Σουηδία 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mientras que usted está escuchando y lee un 
texto sobre Suecia, usted consigue la oportunidad de practicar 
motsatsord. Módulo 4 - ¿Cómo usted vive? - Suecia 
3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
